gameText.name: username
gameText.text: Welcome to ZombieBytes! Enter a username:

gameText.name: defaultStart
gameText.text: Enter 'start' to continue:

gameText.name: punch
gameText.text: You punch the zombie in the face.

gameText.name: intro
gameText.text: Weary from finals and end of the year festivities, you return home to your small home town for summer vacation. When you step off the bus at the town center, however, a chill rises in your spine and you notice that there is nobody in sight.

gameText.name: letter
gameText.text: HELP...something happened...the reasearch going on at the hospital...something went wrong and everyone started...changing? Mutating into some...thing. The only cure is still in the hospital but I think I'm the only one who wasn't attacked. I'm going to try to get it...I may not return but please...somebody...if you find this letter we need your help

gameText.name: outro
gameText.text: THANKS FOR QUITTING

gameText.name: death
gameText.text: You have died

gameText.name: bite
gameText.text: The zombie bit you!

gameText.name: chooseAction
gameText.text: What would you like to do? (walk, inspect, attack, grab, use item, inventory)

gameText.name: noZombies
gameText.text: There are no zombies to attack in this room.

gameText.name: alreadyDefeated
gameText.text: You have already defeated the zombie here.

gameText.name: defaultChooseAction
gameText.text: Please enter a valid action word?

gameText.name: defaultWalk
gameText.text: You are walking. Maybe going a certain direction might be helpful.

gameText.name: monkeyNoBanana
gameText.text: The monkey zombie shrieks at you and you stumble backwards...

gameText.name: ultimateNoKey
gameText.text: There is no way you can face the creature now at your current state.

gameText.name: attackWin
gameText.text: You defeated the zombie

gameText.name: runFail
gameText.text: Your attempt at running away was unsuccessful. The zombie attacks you back!

gameText.name: runWin
gameText.text: You were able to get away!

gameText.name: attackDefault
gameText.text: Please enter a valid choice

gameText.name: lockedIn
gameText.text: This direction is blocked off by too many zombies. Lets choose a different one.
